timeline.message: Clean code - A few spelling errors in the documentation is fixed.
Add "Transit, No Airplane" to the list of available modes to choose from in the OTP Client. Only Norwegian translation is added.
Add utility method to calculate distance between to locations to GeometryUtils.
Clean code - Minor refactorings and toString() improvements.

Remove all transit itineraries with cost higher than the best street-only itinerary.
This replaces the existing LongTransitWalkingFilter, witch solved a narrower set of
use-cases.

Itinerary sort order
- Arrive by: STREET_ONLY, departure-time(latest-first), generalized-cost, num-of-transfers, arrival-time.
- Depart after: STREET_ONLY, arrival-time, generalized-cost, num-of-transfers, departure-time.
- Prepare OtpDefaultSortOrder to be configurable by making it more reusable.

Clean code - Add Itinerary.toStr(..) method and a new TestItineraryBuilder to simplify unit-testing
and improve readability.

timeline.message: Add back the translators context comment removed in 18fd69f6.

Revert "Add utility method to calculate distance between to locations to GeometryUtils.
This functionality exist in the SphericalDistanceLibrary". This reverts part of commit
836477f1.
Exclude LEG_SWITCH from aggregation of itinerary flag and totals.

Clean Code - Remove duplicate test itinerary factory - FilterChainTestData.
Migrate all test using the FilterChainTestData to use TestItineraryBuilder instead.

Clean code/bugfix in DebugFilterWrapper
 - The DebugFilterWrapper was not working properly; Deleted itineraries was not added to the list
   of deleted itineraries, with the result that the next filter-in-chain would also "see" the deleted
   itinerary. This could then influence the result of the reminding filters.
 - Clean code: Some code cleanup like making methods `final` to prevent overriding, forcing all filters
   to override the `removeItineraries()` method. Also, sort on `cost` then `number-of-transfers` in the
   SortOnGeneralizedCost filter. Simplify the GroupByFilter and merging group-ids.

SameTripsHigherCostFilter - Remove short(<10% of distance) first/last legs and then group  the itineraries by the main trips. Then remove all, but one leg based on generalized-cost  for each group. This filter removes some of the variation cased by the timetable-view.
